entry.title: Editor - document #323: NSI v2.0 to v2.1 delta informational document
entry.content:
• File draft-nsi-cs-v2.0-to-v2.1-delta-v10.docx added

tidied up version of delta document.

entry.title: Editor - document #323: NSI v2.0 to v2.1 delta informational document
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to AD review

Per the standards council meeting of May 12, this item awaits area director review prior to entering public comment. #308 will accompany it.

entry.title: Editor - document #323: NSI v2.0 to v2.1 delta informational document
entry.content:
• Status changed from AD review to public comment
  • Assignee changed from Richard Hughes-Jones to Greg Newby

Per the standards council meeting of July 7, this is now approved for 30-day public comment.

entry.title: Editor - document #323: NSI v2.0 to v2.1 delta informational document
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to assigned

We will wait until #308 is ready for public comment, and then send #308 and #323 together. This is because they are related, and it will be more relevant for readers of #323 to have #308 available for review.

entry.title: Editor - document #323: NSI v2.0 to v2.1 delta informational document
entry.content:
• Status changed from assigned to public comment

Per the standards council teleconference on May 11 2018, this is now approved for public comment.

entry.title: Editor - document #323: NSI v2.0 to v2.1 delta informational document
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to to be published

The public comment tracker is here: https://redmine.ogf.org/boards/42/topics/501

There were no public comments. Standards council confirmed it is ready for publication, alongside #308.

entry.title: Editor - document #323: NSI v2.0 to v2.1 delta informational document
entry.content:
• Status changed from to be published to author action

Per email correspondence with the authors/editors:

1. Author affiliations are not listed in the header. Would you like to add these? It's not a requirement, but is typically done. You could also add a section towards the end that lists affiliations.

- Yes, could you please add these affiliations: Chin Guok and John MacAuley: ESnet, Guy Roberts: GEANT Tomohiro Kudoh: tba... he has changed organizations.  I will ask him which he prefers to use.

2. Since you have made the further change with UUID, should you also upload #323, the Delta document? https://redmine.ogf.org/issues/323

- I will ask John M to updated.

Both documents (323 & 308) need to have the correct current copyright statement added (from #152 at www.ogf.org
). I will do this, unless you happen to do it sooner. I will also assign GWD numbers and adjust the headers/dates, as part of the final publication process.

- Yes, please do thanks.

entry.title: Editor - document #323: NSI v2.0 to v2.1 delta informational document
entry.content:
Author affiliation:
    Tomohiro Kudoh
    Information Technology Center, The University of Tokyo
    (if this is too long, just "The University of Tokyo")

entry.title: Editor - document #323: NSI v2.0 to v2.1 delta informational document
entry.content: Note, this will be GFD-I.238 when published.

entry.title: Editor - document #323: NSI v2.0 to v2.1 delta informational document
entry.content: • Status changed from author action to to be published

entry.title: Editor - document #323: NSI v2.0 to v2.1 delta informational document
entry.content:
• File GFD-I.238.docx added
  • File GFD.238.pdf added
  • Status changed from to be published to published

This is now published and online at www.ogf.org

I am attaching the final .docx and .pdf. The only changes I made were to headers/footers, and to use the current (2012) IP/copyright statement.

Thanks again for the great work by the contributors to this document!
